rules_text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
[i]“What has been given to you by Phyrexia can be just as quickly taken away.”
—Ertai[/i]
rules_text2: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text2:
[i]“Dominaria's history runs deep; its soil does not forget its past easily.”
—Karn[/i]
